mapper.select: SELECT exam_idx, idx, name, type, GROUP_CONCAT(select_content ORDER BY seq SEPARATOR ',') AS select_content_list, GROUP_CONCAT(select_score ORDER BY seq SEPARATOR ',') AS select_score_list FROM ( SELECT ql.exam_idx, q.idx, q.name, q.type, s.content AS select_content, s.score AS select_score, s.seq FROM TBL_QUESTION_LIST ql INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION q ON ql.question_idx = q.idx INNER JOIN TBL_SELECT s ON q.idx = s.question_idx WHERE ql.exam_idx = #{idx} ) AS subquery GROUP BY exam_idx, idx, name, type;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_EXAM_RESULT WHERE NAME = #{name} AND PHONE = #{phone}
SELECT TYPE FROM TBL_EXAM WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_EXAM_RESULT (EXAM_IDX , NAME , PHONE , PLACE , SCORE , PRODUCT , RECEIVE , VIDEO , AGE , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM) VALUES (#{exam_idx} , #{name} , #{phone} , #{place} , #{score} , '' , 'no' , 'no' , #{age} , now() , now() )
